places.info: Delhi,[a] officially the National Capital Territory (NCT) of Delhi, is a city and a union territory of India containing New Delhi, the capital of India

places.info: The landscape of Pune district is distributed triangularly in western Maharashtra at the foothills of the Sahyadri Mountains.
places.name: Pune

places.info: Bangalore is considered to be one of the fastest-growing global major metropolises.
